source_objects.title: Database Design & Development
source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.

items.title: IBM Cognos Report Studio
items.headline: Create complex reports, web applications, and dynamic dashboards
objectives_summary: Become comfortable navigating around the Cognos BI application.
Understand the different applications in Cognos and when to use Query Studio or Report Studio
Built ad hoc reports to accomplish quick, on-the-fly reporting requirements

visible_instructors.title: RefactorU LLC
visible_instructors.name: RefactorU

items.headline: We will examine MongoDB, one of the leading NoSQL database systems.
objectives_summary: Course Goal: Store application data using MongoDB
Learn MongoDB command line controls
Integrate MongoDB into your Node apps

items.title: Learn Apache Solr with Big Data and Cloud Computing
items.headline: Apache Solr, Zookeeper, Clusters, Replication, Cloud, Big data, Search algorithms and Much More
objectives_summary: Integrate Search functionality into any web or mobile app
Understand Cloud
Solve Search problem of big data

items.title: Introduction to Azure SQL Database for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Award-Winning Database Expert, Trainer, Author, Speaker.
visible_instructors.title: Artemakis Artemiou
visible_instructors.name: Artemakis

items.headline: Get started with Azure SQL Database and SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines fast and easy! Many live demos included!
objectives_summary: What is Azure Portal and how to use it
How to create and configure your first database on Azure SQL Database
How to configure and manage firewall rules

items.title: SQL Server 2016 Administration
items.headline: Newest and beneficial features of SQL Server 2016
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, the student will be able to learn, configure, and manage the newest features of SQL Server 2016 administration such as data masking, temporal tables, polybase, row level security and much more

items.title: SQL Server Migration and Upgrade Process
items.headline: Migrating databases and upgrading SQL Server versions
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, the student will be versed in how to migrate and older version of SQL server to a newer version of SQL Server and be able to gather the necessary information that is needed for a successful upgrade

items.title: Learning Pivotal Cloud Foundry for Web Developers
items.headline: Become proficient in deploying and managing applications on Cloud Foundry.
objectives_summary: Set up the work space through core concepts
Work with orgs, spaces, roles, and permissions
Monitor an application and logs

items.title: SQL for Developers and Analysts with MS SQL Server
items.headline: Guide for beginners to intermediate using real life examples
objectives_summary: Hands-on learning of SQL and databases using Microsoft SQL Server
Download a free copy of SQL Server 2017 Edition and setting up a working environment
A basic structure of a SQL query structure

items.title: Introduction to Apache Solr 8
items.headline: Fundamental concepts and use-cases of Apache Solr
objectives_summary: Key design considerations for search applications.
Install and configure Apache Solr 8 on a server
How to model your data in the real world

items.title: Learn Azure Cosmos DB basics this weekend in 3 hour

visible_instructors.display_name: Eshant Garg | AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner | LearnCloud.Info | 100,000+ Enrollments

visible_instructors.name: Eshant Garg | AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

items.headline: Basics of Azure Cosmos DB
objectives_summary: Azure Cosmos DB Basics
Cosmos DB - How to Add or modify data from UI
Cosmos DB - Partitioning, Multi-model, Consistency and other important concepts

items.title: First Guide to Dashboards using IBM Cognos Analytics (V11)
items.headline: Create amazing Dashboards using Cognos Analytics and see how to reap useful information by combining variety of data
objectives_summary: Learn to build stunning Dashboards with Cognos Analytics
Acquaint with new unified interface of Cognos Analytics to consume, modify and author reports and dashboards
Learn about the Visualization available to you: How and when to use them, how to interact with them, how to customize them

items.title: ODI 11g Hands On Tutorials

visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Oracle Data Integrator Implementation Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Ramkumar Lanke
visible_instructors.name: Ramkumar

items.headline: Oracle Data Integrator 11g Video Tutorials
objectives_summary: First, you are made familiar with the basics of ETL processes and then learn how to use of ODI development objects with the help of practical examples. You then move on to get an understanding of ODI’s transformation vehicles and its interface, followed by how ODI packages can be used to develop more workflow-based data integration tasks. Next we show you how reusable objects can be customized by using variables to suit your needs. The following sections broaden your understanding of topologies, scenarios, load plans, and data integration solutions.
By the end of the course, you will have enough knowledge of ODI, development, deployment, and maintenance techniques to give you the confidence to develop your own data integration projects.
Covering all the key ODI concepts, this video course shows you how to make the best use of ODI’s declarative approach to define your strategy with Knowledge Modules.

items.title: Learn SQL in 6 days
items.headline: Learn SQL and handle databases confidently
objectives_summary: The primary objective is to make the individual utilizing this tutorial an expert in writing data retrieval statements.

items.title: Learn SQL and MySQL in 3 Hours

visible_instructors.job_title: Software / Web Application developer and now a teacher

visible_instructors.name: Umang

items.headline: Understand what is SQL , Start writing Simple and Complex SQL Queries using MySQL. Very useful for Data Analysis.
objectives_summary: Create SQL/MySQL based applications for companies of all shapes and sizes
Understand all concepts of SQL and databases
Analyze tons of data in few seconds

objectives_summary: Will have great hands on knowledge in latest Redis 6.
Fully capable to use Blazingly Fast NoSql Database.
Students will have solid understanding of Redis fundamentals

items.title: Filemaker Bookings and Reservation System
items.headline: Create a Filemaker system that can be used for any reservation system where items are used for periods of time.
objectives_summary: Create a complete Filemaker database for any business that needs to rent, lend or hire items for a period of time.
Create a complete solution for a hotel, motel or any kind of B&B situation.
Use relationships to search for date related conflicts.
